short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Daily Motivational Quotes that nurture your spark of success

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daily Motivational Quotes extension, powered by Edignite Ngo, can be used to read the best motivational quotes to keep yourself going.

Here the you just need to add the extension to the browser. And then you will get a different quote upon every single click on the extension. 

This will help you stay motivated whenever you start losing your energy.
